text: SLV may refer to: *IATA code for Shimla Airport, India *ISO 3166 code for El Salvador *Slovenian language *Satellite Launch Vehicle, an Indian space launcher *Civil Aviation Administration Denmark (Statens Luftfartsvæsen) *iShares Silver Trust, a silver exchange-traded product, NYSE symbol *State Library Victoria, the central library of Victoria (Australia). == References ==
title: SLV
